players.name: Alice
memory: You: "I am shocked that Bob was killed last night. We need to work together carefully to find the mafia among us before more of us are lost."
Charlie: "Alice is the mafia. I investigated her last night and found out the truth. We need to vote her out now before she kills again."
You: "Alice is innocent! Charlie is trying to mislead us because he doesn't have any proof. Why would I accuse myself? We should focus on finding the real detective instead."
Charlie: "Alice is lying to protect herself. If she were innocent, she wouldn’t attack me so fiercely. We only have one mafia, and I’m telling the truth. Vote Alice now."
Diana: "Charlie has been talking about being the detective since day 1, and now he is accusing Alice. His story keeps changing."

players.name: Charlie
memory: You investigated Alice and discovered that they are the mafioso.
Alice: "I am shocked that Bob was killed last night. We need to work together carefully to find the mafia among us before more of us are lost."

Alice: "Alice is innocent! Charlie is trying to mislead us because he doesn't have any proof. Why would I accuse myself? We should focus on finding the real detective instead."
You: "Alice is lying to protect herself. If she were innocent, she wouldn’t attack me so fiercely. We only have one mafia, and I’m telling the truth. Vote Alice now."
Diana: "Charlie has been talking about being the detective since day 1, and now he is accusing Alice. His story keeps changing."
Votes: Alice voted for Charlie, Charlie voted for Alice, Diana voted for Alice
